briefdescription.para: Populate nas_map0 and/or ntn_map0 with named substring and/or name to number mapping.
Push maps into the vectors pointed by vec_num, vec_nas and vec_ntn and thus store match results in them.

detaileddescription.para: No need to implement it completely.

briefdescription.para: Destructor.

detaileddescription.para: Deletes the temporary maps that were created to store substrings

briefdescription.para: Set a pointer to the numbered substring vector of type jpcre2::VecNum.
Set a pointer to the named substring vector of type jpcre2::VecNas.
Set a pointer to the name to number map vector of type jpcre2::VecNtN.
Set the subject string m_subject.
Set the modifier (overwrites existing JPCRE2 and PCRE2 option).

detaileddescription.para: Re-initializes the option bits for PCRE2 and JPCRE2 options, then parses the modifier to set their equivalent options.

Note: If speed of operation is very crucial, use RegexMatch::setJpcre2Option() and RegexMatch::setPcre2Option() with equivalent options. It will be faster that way.
s
Modifier string
RegexMatch&
RegexReplace::setModifier()
Regex::setModifier()

briefdescription.para: Set JPCRE2 option jpcre2_match_opts (overwrite existing option)
Set PCRE2 option match_opts (overwrite existing option)
Set whether to perform global match.
Parse modifier and add/remove equivalent PCRE2 and JPCRE2 options.

detaileddescription.para: After a call to this function match_opts and jpcre2_match_opts will be properly set. This function does not initialize or re-initialize options. If you want to set options from scratch, initialize them to their default values before calling this function.

Note: If speed of operation is very crucial, use RegexMatch::changeJpcre2Option() and RegexMatch::changePcre2Option() with equivalent options. It will be faster that way.
mod
Modifier string
x
Whether to add or remove options
RegexMatch&
RegexReplace::changeModifier()
Regex::changeModifier()

briefdescription.para: Add or remove a JPCRE2 option.

parameterdescription.para: Add the option if it's true, remove otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Add or remove a PCRE2 option.

parameterdescription.para: Add the option if it's true, remove otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Parse modifier string and add equivalent PCRE2 and JPCRE2 options.

detaileddescription.para: This is just a wrapper of the original function RegexMatch::changeModifier() provided for convenience.

Note: If speed of operation is very crucial, use RegexMatch::addJpcre2Option() and RegexMatch::addPcre2Option() with equivalent options. It will be faster that way.
mod
Modifier string
RegexMatch&
RegexReplace::addModifier()
Regex::addModifier()

briefdescription.para: Add option to existing JPCRE2 options jpcre2_match_opts.
Add option to existing PCRE2 options match_opts.
Store match result in vectors and return the number of matches.

detaileddescription.para: Clear the specified vectors (vec_num, vec_nas, vec_ntn) and re-fill them with match results, then return the match count.

The size of each vectors should be equal to the match count. The return value is guaranteed to give you the right match count.
Regex::error_number
Throws exception (error number) if error occurs during match.
Number of matches found
SIZE_T Regex::match(const String& s)
SIZE_T Regex::match(const String& s, const String& mod)

briefdescription.para: Provides the RegexMatch::match() function to perform regex matching.

detaileddescription.para: Provides chained methods to set various options.
All constructors of this class are private.
